title: mlflow deployment python flavors issue
body:
I have deployed my model into mlflow by using data bricks by using below code

with mlflow.start_run(): 
  mlflow.sklearn.log_model(
        sk_model = sample_model,
        artifact_path = "samplefolder",
        registered_model_name = "sample-mlmodel",
        serialization_format = mlflow.sklearn.SERIALIZATION_FORMAT_PICKLE,
        conda_env = conda_env
    )

I go to verify Machine Learning models in Databricks and I see as below and I have observed python_function favlor is missing and it is causing issue when it is trying to deploy using ACI. Can you please help me how to resolve the issue,

artifact_path: retailstores
databricks_runtime: 8.2.x-scala2.12
flavors:
  sklearn:
    pickled_model: model.pkl
    serialization_format: pickle
    sklearn_version: 0.23.2
run_id: 50fdab13993446aeb6c5ec854xxx1731
utc_time_created: '2021-07-15 18:06:23.574932'
